text: Cussey-sur-Lison is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. On 1 January 2022, Châtillon-sur-Lison became a part of the commune of Cussey-sur-Lison.Arrêté préfectoral, 14 December 2021 == References == Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Cussey-sur-Lison
